server.name: NullBridge MCP
server.description: Cross-Chain Asset Bridge Agent using thirdweb - Bridge assets across multiple blockchain networks
server.author: ENVXX

tools.name: bridge_asset
tools.description: Bridge/swap assets across different blockchain networks using thirdweb. Returns a confirmation URL for manual transaction confirmation.

fromChainId.description: ID of the source chain (e.g., 42161 for Arbitrum, 8453 for Base, 1 for Ethereum)

toChainId.description: ID of the destination chain (e.g., 8453 for Base, 42161 for Arbitrum, 1 for Ethereum)

fromTokenAddress.description: Address of the token to swap from (use 0xEeeeeEeeeEeEeeEeEeEeeEEEeeeeEeeeeeeeEEeE for native tokens like ETH, MATIC)

toTokenAddress.description: Address of the token to swap to

amount.description: Amount of tokens to swap in human-readable format (e.g., '0.5', '1.0')

toAddress.description: Wallet address that will receive the assets (optional)
